name: Friday Night Funkin' + Hatsune Miku full week (KADE ENGINE)
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' + Hatsune Miku full week (KADE ENGINE)
description:
NOTICE: I AM PORTING THESE SO PEOPLE CAN ACCSESS THEM WHO NORMALY COULD'NT, IF YOU ARE THE CREATOR OF THIS MOD, YOU HAVE FULL PERMISSION TO TAKE THIS DOWN.FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' + HATSUNE MIKU FULL WEEK OPTIMIZED FOR CHROMEBOOKS REPLACES WEEK 1 AND MONSTER mod: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/17106 FNF: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin based on Friday Night Funkin Foned: https://phykro.itch.io/fonedin known issues: Miku doesn't have angry animations due me being stupid lmao (sorry)

Miku also on the last song freezes when there are lots of notes on her side, I believe this is a bug with the browser version. because this same thing happens with worship in the mid-fight masses mod.
